reviews.review: Marvel listens to the fans and remain three undisputed leader in visual storytelling.  I usually hate when the original source material from comic books get reformatted for the big screen..... however, this is one scenario where I completely agree with every change that has been made. The Infinity Gauntlet series couldn't be more phenomenal.

Not only was this movie greatly made and perfectly executed, it shows the benefits of waiting and being patient with character development, plots, and script. The movie has so much success that the voice of the haters who want act like if they such a higher state of consciousness when it comes to understanding movies when really they just want someone to say ï¿ 1/2 Wow youï¿ 1/2(TM)re smart ï¿ 1/2 are at a volume so low that theyï¿ 1/2(TM)re 100% irrelevant.

Now this is more like it.  Not a great movie, won't win any oscars except maybe a technical one.... but highly entertaining and not full of that SJW crap that thoroughly ruined the Last Jedi.   Prime example of good story telling with strong male and female characters, no gender politics needed, no diversity dogma (that naturally came with the well written character Black Panther and did not feel forced).  Just straight up good fun and ended on a superb cliff hanger.... can't wait to see the next one.
Impressive juggling act with a massive cast, but this leads to unavoidable pacing issues.
happy and sad at the same time. epic
Fun and one of the better Marvel movies. Short of 5 stars due to the frantic nature, as it tries to squeeze too much in one movie.

It's a great movie, but before I say anything about I need the second part, mainly because it's not a finished movie much like the lord of the rings. Without part 2 I can't really say much other then it made me like characters I once hated. Waiting for part 2 to share my full opinion.
avengers was pretty good, I expected a part 2. but this was still well done. as long as black panther stays dead, this finally will be worth it.

Nothing but 2 1/2 hours of all your favorite super heroes sucking at being super heroes. And in the end, it leaves you with despair and emptiness. Way too long, too many characters and literally NOTHING good happened in the entire movie. Seriously I think I'm done with Marvel movies.
